code:
---
config:
  layout: elk
  theme: neo-dark
---
flowchart LR
  %% Shapes:
  %% - ([text]) rounded actor
  %% - [[text]] system
  %% - [text] rectangle
  %% Arrows show data/control flow.

  subgraph Actors [External Actors]
    U([General User])
    S([Staff])
    M([Manager])
    A([Admin])
    D([Dev])
  end

  P["EON-OpenSlicer System - Single UI, Maintenance, Slic3r, Airtable"]

  U -->|Submit job STLs, view status| P
  S -->|Queue jobs, run prints, update status| P
  M -->|Approve or deny jobs, prioritize| P
  A -->|Manage users, roles, printers, policies| P
  D -->|Service or API access, tokens, hooks| P

  P -->|Status notifications, receipts, logs| U
  P -->|Printer dashboards, alerts| S
  P -->|Reports, approvals, KPIs| M
  P -->|Audits, role management, maintenance KPIs| A
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
